member.name: ID3D11LibraryReflection.GetDesc
member.summary: Fills the library descriptor structure for the library reflection.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives a description of the library reflection.
member.returns: Returns one of the Direct3D 11 Return Codes.

member.name: ID3D11LibraryReflection.GetFunctionByIndex
member.param: The zero-based index of the function reflector to retrieve.
member.returns: A pointer to a interface that represents the function reflector.

summary.para:
A library-reflection interface accesses library info.
Note This interface is part of the HLSL shader linking technology that you can use on all Direct3D 11 platforms to create precompiled HLSL functions, package them into libraries, and link them into full shaders at run time.
